instruction: Generate a meaningful and detailed description of a house.
output: The house was a large, two-story structure with a red brick exterior, white shutters, and a blue slate roof. The entrance opened up to a spacious foyer with a chandelier and a marble staircase that went up to the second floor. On the first floor, there was a living room with comfortable armchairs and a fire place, as well as a kitchen with modern appliances and a dining room with a large wooden table. On the second floor, there were four bedrooms and two bathrooms. In the backyard, there was a well-manicured lawn and a swimming pool.
